enc.name: Highwaymen
enc.description: A group of bandits, armed to the teeth, are lying in wait to ambush unsuspecting travelers.

enc.name: Niko
enc.description: Niko teleports behind the party and attempts to whip one of the players with an extension cord.

enc.name: Travelling Merchant
enc.description: A lone merchant, heavily laden with goods, is making their way down the highway. They may offer to trade or sell goods to the party.

enc.name: Group of Pilgrims
enc.description: A group of devout pilgrims, traveling to a nearby holy site, are seeking donations or food from the party.

enc.name: Wanted Poster
enc.description: A posted notice on a nearby tree or milestone announces a reward for the capture of a notorious outlaw, who may be hiding in the nearby area.

enc.name: Abandoned Cart
enc.description: A rickety cart, abandoned by its owner, contains a few scattered goods and a cryptic note hinting at a local mystery

enc.name: Mysterious Stranger
enc.description: A hooded figure, dressed in dark clothing, is watching the party from a distance.

enc.name: Roadside Shrine
enc.description: A small, old shrine dedicated to a deity stands on the side of the road.
